errors.max: Please select no more than {max} options

HeroSection.title: Travel isn't just where you go. It's who guides you there.
HeroSection.subtitle: Mihape connects you with trusted local companions who accompany you from start to finish — across cities, across countries, across cultures.
HeroSection.earlyAccess: Early access: Join the waiting list now and be among the first to explore with Mihape.

StorySection.title:
Peace of mind for you.

Freedom for them.

Connection for everyone.
StorySection.description:
Whether it’s your parents exploring Europe, a solo traveler venturing somewhere new, or friends seeking deeper local experiences,



Mihape pairs every traveler with a trusted companion-guide who stays by their side from start to finish.

caring.title: Caring companionship for loved ones
caring.description: Your loved ones want to explore the world, even when you can’t join. Mihape finds a caring, vetted companion to accompany them every step of the journey.

safety.title: Safe journeys for solo adventurers
safety.description: Traveling alone doesn’t mean being on your own. With Mihape, explore safely with someone who speaks your language and shares your curiosity.

culture.title: Deeper connections through culture
culture.description: Go beyond the checklist. Discover food, nature, and stories with companions who live them, not scripted tours.

HowItWorksSection.title: How It Works
HowItWorksSection.description: Getting started with Mihape is simple. Three easy steps to your perfect travel companion.

tell_us_about_your_trip.title: Tell us your trip wishes
tell_us_about_your_trip.description: Fill the Trip Wizard with destinations, dates, and specific needs for your journey.

get_matched_with_guides.title: Get matched with guides
get_matched_with_guides.description: We find companions who share your language, vibe, and travel experience preferences.

travel_together.title: Travel together
travel_together.description: Enjoy your trip with a trusted local guide by your side, ensuring a safe and enriching experience.

WhyMihapeSection.title: Why Mihape
WhyMihapeSection.description: Whether you're a traveler, family member, or local guide, Mihape creates meaningful connections that enrich every journey.

families.title: For Families
families.subtitle: Peace of mind when you can't be there.
families.description: Your loved ones can explore the world confidently while you stay connected and informed throughout their journey.

travelers.title: For Travelers
travelers.subtitle: Safer journeys, authentic experiences, personal care.
travelers.description: We match you with guides based on your interests, language, and travel style for a truly personalized experience, who ensures your safety and enriches your cultural understanding.

guides.title: For Guides
guides.subtitle: Earn by traveling, sharing culture, and helping others.
guides.description: Turn your passion for travel and local knowledge into meaningful income while creating lasting connections with visitors.

EmailConfirmationPage.title: Please confirm your email
EmailConfirmationPage.checkEmailAndSpam: Please check your email for a confirmation link. If you don't see it, please check your spam folder.
EmailConfirmationPage.resendEmailConfirmation: If you still have not received the email, write your email below and click the button to resend the confirmation email.
EmailConfirmationPage.resendEmailConfirmationIn: You can resend the confirmation email in {waitingTime}

LoginPage.title: Welcome Back
LoginPage.description: Log in to continue exploring your favorite travel destinations.

RegisterPage.title: Create Your Account
RegisterPage.description: Join our community to start exploring and sharing travel experiences.
RegisterPage.termsAndConditions: By registering, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacyPolicy>Privacy Policy</privacyPolicy>.

validationError.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

validationError.uppercase: contain at least one uppercase letter
validationError.lowercase: contain at least one lowercase letter

preferences.title: Let's Plan Your Dream Trip
preferences.subtitle: Tell us what you're imagining, we’ll bring it to life.

destination.label: Where do you want to go?

travelDates.label: When do you want to travel?

flexibleDates.label: My travel dates are flexible
flexibleDates.description: If you select this option, we will suggest the best dates based on your preferences.

description.label: Tell us about your trip
description.placeholder: We're a couple looking for a romantic getaway in Paris with a mix of sightseeing and relaxation. We love art, history, and trying local cuisine.

addDetails.label: Add more details about the trip

interests.label: Interests
interests.description: Select up to {max} interests that you would like to explore during your trip.

vibe.label: How would you like the travel vibe to be?
vibe.description: Choose the vibe that best matches your travel style.

personality.label: Which type of person do you prefer as your guide?
personality.description: Select up to {max} personality traits that best describe your ideal guide.

itinerary.title: Your Personalized Trip Itinerary
itinerary.subtitle: Tailored to your preferences by our AI travel concierge.

guide.title: Your Matched Guide
guide.subtitle: We’ve found the perfect local guide for your journey.

metadata.title: Become Guide - {step} | Mihape
metadata.description: Join our community of local guides and share your passion for travel. Complete the onboarding process to start guiding travelers and creating unforgettable experiences.

1.label: Welcome
1.title: Let's Get Started
1.description: Thank you for your interest in becoming a guide on our platform. We're excited to have you on board! This onboarding process will help you set up your profile and get ready to share your knowledge and passion for travel with others.

2.label: Basics
2.title: Profile Information
2.description: Tell us about yourself to help us match you with the right travelers.

travelRadius.label: Travel Radius
travelRadius.placeholder: How far you are willing to travel from each of the cities

3.label: Expertise
3.title: Your Expertise
3.description: What are your areas of expertise? Share your skills and knowledge to attract the right travelers.

personality.label: Personality
personality.description: Select up to {max} personality traits that best describe your guiding style.

validationError.required: Please select at least {min} personality trait
validationError.min: Please select at least {min} personality traits
validationError.max: Please select no more than {max} personality traits

interest.label: Interests
interest.description: Select up to {max} interests that you are passionate about and can share with travelers.

validationError.max: Please select no more than {max} interests

specialization.label: Specialization
specialization.description: What type of tours or experiences do you specialize in? Choose up to {max} specializations.

validationError.max: Please select no more than {max} specializations

bio.label: About you
bio.description: Tell travelers a bit about yourself, your background, and why you love being a guide. (Max {max} characters)
bio.placeholder: I'm a passionate local guide with over 5 years of experience showing travelers around the hidden gems of my city.

validationError.required: Please write a brief bio about yourself
validationError.maxLength: Bio must be no more than {max} characters

4.label: Pricing
4.title: Your Rates
4.description: Set your pricing for guiding services. Be transparent about your rates to attract more travelers.

validationError.required: Please enter your base rate per hour
validationError.max: Rate must be no more than {max}

validationError.required: Please enter your base rate per day
validationError.max: Rate must be no more than {max}

maxGroupSize.label: Maximum Group Size
maxGroupSize.description: Set the maximum number of travelers you can accommodate in a single tour or experience.

validationError.required: Please enter your maximum group size
validationError.min: Group size must be at least {min}
validationError.max: Group size must be no more than {max}

5.label: Availability
5.title: Availability
5.description: Let travelers know when you're available to guide them. This helps in scheduling and planning.

6.label: Media
6.title: Media Upload
6.description: Upload photos and videos that showcase your guiding style and the experiences you offer. This will help travelers get to know you better.

7.label: Identity
7.title: Identity Verification
7.description: Verify your identity to build trust with travelers. This step is crucial for ensuring a safe and secure experience.

8.label: Review
8.title: Review Your Profile
8.description: Take a moment to review your profile and ensure all information is accurate and complete. This is your chance to make a great first impression.

NotFoundPage.title: Oops, we took the wrong turn!
NotFoundPage.description: The page we're looking for doesn't exist. Don't worry, I'll guide us back!
